last_episode_to_air.name: I'm a No-Rust, Build-Up Man Myself
last_episode_to_air.overview: As prom looms around the corner, JD and Veronica are moving in opposite directions. She is closer to her friends than she has been all year, while he is trying to use prom to keep Westerburg divided by pitting Heather Duke against Heather Chandler.

name: Heathers
overview: A pitch-black comedy anthology set in the present day, as our heroine Veronica Sawyer deals with a very different but equally vicious group of Heathers. Based on the 1988 cult classic film.

episodes.name: Pilot
episodes.overview: Veronica Sawyer tires to make sense of her path in life and her connection to her â€œbest friends".

episodes.name: She's Going to Cry
episodes.overview: Heather Chandler blackmails JD and Veronica into doing her bidding; Heather Duke and Heather McNamara struggle to adapt to life in the new regime led by Betty Finn.

episodes.name: Date Rapes and AIDS Jokes
episodes.overview: Veronica, fed up with JD, goes on a double date with Heather Duke and two handsome football players; the school musical auditions commence and Heather Chandler meets unexpected competition.

episodes.name: Our Love is God
episodes.overview: Heather Chandler tries to double down on her suicide campaign only to have her brand tarnished; Betty Finn has some suspicions that link Veronica to an unsolved murder.

episodes.name: Reindeer Games
episodes.overview: The world through JD's eyes; the police interrogate Betty and JD; anonymous text messages tying JD to his crimes hound him.

episodes.name: Hot Probs
episodes.overview: Veronica schools JD on how to be a proper boyfriend; Heather Duke and Heather Chandler spar over control of the hearts and minds of the Westerburg student body.

episodes.name: Do I Look Like Mother Theresa?
episodes.overview: Ousted from power, Heather Chandler decides to swallow her pride and do the impossible: apologize. She spends time with the less-fortunate at Westerburg, and learns from an unexpected source that Heather Duke has a skeleton in his closet.

episodes.name: Call Us When Shuttle Lands
episodes.overview: In response to the spate of violence and unrest in their area, Westerburg decides to stage an "active shooter" training drill in which students are placed on lockdown while the drama teacher goes classroom-to-classroom spraying people with silly string.

episodes.name: I'm a No-Rust, Build-Up Man Myself
episodes.overview: As prom looms around the corner, JD and Veronica are moving in opposite directions. She is closer to her friends than she has been all year, while he is trying to use prom to keep Westerburg divided by pitting Heather Duke against Heather Chandler.
